mapper.update:
UPDATE insurance_sales_info
insurance_sales_id = #{insuranceSalesId}, insurance_saler = #{insuranceSaler}, sex = #{sex}, insurance_saler_no = #{insuranceSalerNo}, cooperation_type = #{cooperationType}, sales_org_id = #{salesOrgId}, sales_team_id = #{salesTeamId}, rank_sequence_id = #{rankSequenceId}, sales_grade_id = #{salesGradeId}, card_type = #{cardType}, card_no = #{cardNo}, mobile = #{mobile},
join_date = #{joinDate}, join_date = null,
pass_date = #{passDate}, pass_date = null,
bank_channel = #{bankChannel}, bank_card_no = #{bankCardNo},
birthday = #{birthday}, birthday = null,
country = #{country}, nation = #{nation}, political_appearance = #{politicalAppearance}, party = #{party}, area_code = #{areaCode}, address = #{address}, native_place = #{nativePlace}, household_reg_place = #{householdRegPlace}, archives_preservation_place = #{archivesPreservationPlace}, post_code = #{postCode}, cell_phone = #{cellPhone}, duty_type = #{dutyType}, email = #{email}, qq_number = #{qqNumber}, wechat_number = #{wechatNumber}, academic_degree = #{academicDegree}, educational_bg = #{educationalBg}, foreign_language_ability = #{foreignLanguageAbility}, marital_status = #{maritalStatus},
marriage_date = #{marriageDate}, marriage_date = null,
pre_company = #{preCompany}, pre_occupation = #{preOccupation}, leaving_certificate = #{leavingCertificate}, certificate_number = #{certificateNumber}, certificate_status = #{certificateStatus},
certificate_start_date = #{certificateStartDate}, certificate_start_date = null,
certificate_end_date = #{certificateEndDate}, certificate_end_date = null,
having_work_group = #{havingWorkGroup}, work_group_phone = #{workGroupPhone}, internal_referral = #{internalReferral}, interest = #{interest}, remark = #{remark}, now_tree_code = #{nowTreeCode}, next_tree_code = #{nextTreeCode},
next_tree_code_idate = #{nextTreeCodeIdate}, next_tree_code_idate = null,
sales_status = #{salesStatus}, created_by = #{createdBy}, created_time = #{createdTime}, updated_by = #{updatedBy},
openBank = #{openBank},
updated_time = now(), QUIT_DATE = #{quitDate}
WHERE `insurance_sales_id` = #{insuranceSalesId}

UPDATE insurance_sales_info
insurance_sales_id = #{insuranceSalesId}, insurance_saler = #{insuranceSaler}, sex = #{sex}, insurance_saler_no = #{insuranceSalerNo}, cooperation_type = #{cooperationType}, sales_org_id = #{salesOrgId}, sales_team_id = #{salesTeamId}, rank_sequence_id = #{rankSequenceId}, sales_grade_id = #{salesGradeId}, card_type = #{cardType}, card_no = #{cardNo}, mobile = #{mobile},
join_date = #{joinDate}, join_date = null,
pass_date = #{passDate}, pass_date = null,
bank_channel = #{bankChannel}, bank_card_no = #{bankCardNo},
birthday = #{birthday}, birthday = null,
country = #{country}, nation = #{nation}, political_appearance = #{politicalAppearance}, party = #{party}, area_code = #{areaCode}, address = #{address}, native_place = #{nativePlace}, household_reg_place = #{householdRegPlace}, archives_preservation_place = #{archivesPreservationPlace}, post_code = #{postCode}, cell_phone = #{cellPhone}, duty_type = #{dutyType}, email = #{email}, qq_number = #{qqNumber}, wechat_number = #{wechatNumber}, academic_degree = #{academicDegree}, educational_bg = #{educationalBg}, foreign_language_ability = #{foreignLanguageAbility}, marital_status = #{maritalStatus},
marriage_date = #{marriageDate}, marriage_date = null,
pre_company = #{preCompany}, pre_occupation = #{preOccupation}, leaving_certificate = #{leavingCertificate}, certificate_number = #{certificateNumber}, certificate_status = #{certificateStatus},
certificate_start_date = #{certificateStartDate}, certificate_start_date = null,
certificate_end_date = #{certificateEndDate}, certificate_end_date = null,
having_work_group = #{havingWorkGroup}, work_group_phone = #{workGroupPhone}, internal_referral = #{internalReferral}, interest = #{interest}, remark = #{remark}, now_tree_code = #{nowTreeCode}, next_tree_code = #{nextTreeCode},
next_tree_code_idate = #{nextTreeCodeIdate}, next_tree_code_idate = null,
sales_status = #{salesStatus}, created_by = #{createdBy}, created_time = #{createdTime}, updated_by = #{updatedBy},
openBank = #{openBank},
updated_time = #{updatedTime}
WHERE `insurance_sales_id` = #{insuranceSalesId}

update insurance_sales_info
direct_group_c = insurance_sales_id
where direct_group_c = '0000'

update insurance_sales_info
direct_dept_b = insurance_sales_id
where direct_dept_b = '0000'
mapper.select:
select isi.*,sg.SALES_ORG_NAME,st.SALES_TEAM_NAME from insurance_sales_info isi left join sales_org_info sg on isi.sales_org_id = sg.sales_org_id left join sales_team_info st on isi.sales_team_id = st.sales_team_id
1=1
AND isi.insurance_sales_id = #{insuranceSalesId}
limit 1

select isi.insurance_saler_no,sq.* from saler_quit_info sq left join insurance_sales_info isi on sq.saler_id = isi.insurance_sales_id
1=1
AND sq.saler_id = #{salerId}
order by sq.quit_id desc limit 1

select * from insurance_sales_info
INSURANCE_SALER_NO=#{insuranceSalerNo}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM insurance_sales_info WHERE TJ_SALES_ID = #{tjSalesId} AND SALES_STATUS BETWEEN 0 AND 1
SELECT INSURANCE_SALES_ID FROM insurance_sales_info WHERE TJ_SALES_ID = #{tjSalesId} AND SJ_SALES_ID = #{tjSalesId} AND SALES_GRADE_ID = 5 AND (SALES_STATUS BETWEEN 0 AND 1)
SELECT INSURANCE_SALES_ID FROM insurance_sales_info WHERE SJ_SALES_ID = #{salesId} AND (SALES_GRADE_ID BETWEEN 4 AND 5) AND (SALES_STATUS BETWEEN 0 AND 1)
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM insurance_sales_info WHERE YC_SALES_ID = #{ycSalesId} AND SALES_GRADE_ID = #{salesGradeId} AND SALES_STATUS BETWEEN 0 AND 1

SELECT INSURANCE_SALES_ID FROM insurance_sales_info WHERE (SJ_SALES_ID = #{salesId} OR SJ_SALES_ID = #{salesId}) AND (SALES_STATUS BETWEEN 0 AND 1)
AND SALES_GRADE_ID BETWEEN 3 AND 7
AND SALES_GRADE_ID BETWEEN 3 AND 6
AND SALES_GRADE_ID BETWEEN 2 AND 7

select isi.*,sg.SALES_ORG_NAME,st.SALES_TEAM_NAME from insurance_sales_info isi left join sales_org_info sg on isi.sales_org_id = sg.sales_org_id left join sales_team_info st on isi.sales_team_id = st.sales_team_id where isi.insurance_sales_id IN
#{item}
mapper.update: UPDATE insurance_sales_info isi SET isi.direct_dept_b = ( CASE isi.direct_dept_b WHEN '0' THEN isi.INSURANCE_SALES_ID ELSE isi.direct_dept_b END ), isi.direct_group_c = ( CASE isi.direct_group_c WHEN '0' THEN isi.INSURANCE_SALES_ID ELSE isi.direct_group_c END ) WHERE isi.INSURANCE_SALES_ID = #{salesId}
mapper.delete:
delete from sales_relative where ship_type = '2' and sales_id in
#{item.salesId}
mapper.select:
SELECT CONCAT( isi.INSURANCE_SALER, '<', ifnull(sti.SALES_TEAM_NAME, '-'), '>' ) AS name_team, isi.INSURANCE_SALER_NO, isi.INSURANCE_SALER, soi.SALES_ORG_NAME, sti.SALES_TEAM_NAME, isi.SALES_GRADE_ID, sg.SALES_GRADE_NAME, isi.INSURANCE_SALES_ID, soi.cal_org_id, CASE WHEN sml.NEXT_SALES_GRADE_ID IS NOT NULL THEN sml.NEXT_SALES_GRADE_ID ELSE isi.SALES_GRADE_ID END AS NEXT_SALES_GRADE_ID FROM insurance_sales_info isi LEFT JOIN sales_org_info soi ON isi.SALES_ORG_ID = soi.SALES_ORG_ID LEFT JOIN sales_team_info sti ON isi.SALES_TEAM_ID = sti.SALES_TEAM_ID LEFT JOIN sales_grade sg ON isi.SALES_GRADE_ID = sg.SALES_GRADE_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from sales_move_logs sm where sm.MOVE_DATE = #{moveDate}) sml ON sml.SALER_ID = isi.INSURANCE_SALES_ID
1=1 and isi.SALES_STATUS in ('0', '1') and isi.INSURANCE_SALER_NO = #{salerNo} and isi.INSURANCE_SALES_ID IN (${salesIds}) and isi.INSURANCE_SALER LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{query}), '%') and isi.INSURANCE_SALER_NO LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{queryNo}), '%')
AND FIND_IN_SET(isi.sales_org_id, #{myAllOrgIds}) > 0

SELECT nisi.INSURANCE_SALES_ID, nisi.INSURANCE_SALER, nisi.INSURANCE_SALER_NO, nisi.NEXT_SALES_GRADE_ID, nisi.NEXT_TEAM_ID, sti.SALES_TEAM_NAME, sg.SALES_GRADE_NAME, soi.cal_org_id FROM ( SELECT isi.INSURANCE_SALES_ID, isi.INSURANCE_SALER_NO, isi.INSURANCE_SALER, CASE WHEN sml.NEXT_ORG_ID IS NOT NULL THEN sml.NEXT_ORG_ID ELSE isi.SALES_ORG_ID END AS NEXT_ORG_ID, CASE WHEN sml.NEXT_SALES_GRADE_ID IS NOT NULL THEN sml.NEXT_SALES_GRADE_ID ELSE isi.SALES_GRADE_ID END AS NEXT_SALES_GRADE_ID, CASE WHEN sml.NEXT_TEAM_ID IS NOT NULL THEN sml.NEXT_TEAM_ID ELSE isi.SALES_TEAM_ID END AS NEXT_TEAM_ID FROM insurance_sales_info isi LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from sales_move_logs sm where sm.MOVE_DATE = #{moveDate}) sml ON isi.INSURANCE_SALES_ID = sml.SALER_ID WHERE isi.INSURANCE_SALES_ID = #{insuranceSalesId}) nisi LEFT JOIN sales_team_info sti ON nisi.NEXT_TEAM_ID = sti.SALES_TEAM_ID LEFT JOIN sales_grade sg ON nisi.NEXT_SALES_GRADE_ID = sg.SALES_GRADE_ID LEFT JOIN sales_org_info soi ON nisi.NEXT_ORG_ID = soi.SALES_ORG_ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE insurance_sales_info
db_sales_id = #{dbSalesId}, tj_sales_id = #{tjSalesId}, sj_sales_id = #{sjSalesId}, jc_sales_id = #{jcSalesId}, fd_sales_id = #{fdSalesId},
db_sales_date = #{dbSalesDate}, db_sales_date = null,
tj_sales_date = #{tjSalesDate}, tj_sales_date = null,
sj_sales_date = #{sjSalesDate}, sj_sales_date = null,
jc_sales_date = #{jcSalesDate}, jc_sales_date = null,
fd_sales_date = #{fdSalesDate}, fd_sales_date = null,
yc_c_first_gener = #{ycCFirstGener}, yc_c_second_gener = #{ycCSecondGener}, yc_b_first_gener = #{ycBFirstGener}, yc_b_second_gener = #{ycBSecondGener}, direct_group_c = #{directGroupC}, direct_dept_b = #{directDeptB},
establish_time = #{establishTime}, establish_time = null,
establish_time1 = #{establishTime1}, establish_time1 = null,
establish_time2 = #{establishTime2}, establish_time2 = null,
establish_time3 = #{establishTime3}, establish_time3 = null,
establish_time4 = #{establishTime4}, establish_time4 = null,
establish_time5 = #{establishTime5}, establish_time5 = null,
updated_time = now()
WHERE `insurance_sales_id` = #{insuranceSalesId}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL( max( SUBSTRING(shi.INSURANCE_SALER_NO ,- 5) ), '00000' ) AS maxSalerNo FROM insurance_sales_info shi WHERE LEFT(shi.INSURANCE_SALER_NO,LENGTH(shi.INSURANCE_SALER_NO) - 5) = #{prefixInsuranceSalerNo};
SELECT IFNULL( max( SUBSTRING(shi.employee_no ,- 5) ), '00000' ) AS maxSalerNo FROM salers_hk_info shi WHERE LEFT(shi.employee_no,LENGTH(shi.employee_no) - 5) = #{findMaxSalerNo};

update.foreach:
UPDATE insurance_sales_info
db_sales_id = #{item.dbSalesId}, tj_sales_id = #{item.tjSalesId}, sj_sales_id = #{item.sjSalesId}, jc_sales_id = #{item.jcSalesId}, fd_sales_id = #{item.fdSalesId},
db_sales_date = #{item.dbSalesDate}, db_sales_date = null,
tj_sales_date = #{item.tjSalesDate}, tj_sales_date = null,
sj_sales_date = #{item.sjSalesDate}, sj_sales_date = null,
jc_sales_date = #{item.jcSalesDate}, jc_sales_date = null,
fd_sales_date = #{item.fdSalesDate}, fd_sales_date = null,
yc_c_first_gener = #{item.ycCFirstGener}, yc_c_second_gener = #{item.ycCSecondGener}, yc_b_first_gener = #{item.ycBFirstGener}, yc_b_second_gener = #{item.ycBSecondGener}, direct_group_c = #{item.directGroupC}, direct_dept_b = #{item.directDeptB},
establish_time = #{item.establishTime}, establish_time = null,
establish_time1 = #{item.establishTime1}, establish_time1 = null,
establish_time2 = #{item.establishTime2}, establish_time2 = null,
establish_time3 = #{item.establishTime3}, establish_time3 = null,
establish_time4 = #{item.establishTime4}, establish_time4 = null,
establish_time5 = #{item.establishTime5}, establish_time5 = null,
updated_time = now()
WHERE `insurance_sales_id` = #{item.insuranceSalesId}

mapper.update: UPDATE insurance_sales_info isi SET isi.yc_c_first_gener = NULL, isi.establish_time = NULL WHERE isi.yc_c_first_gener = #{insuranceSalerId}
UPDATE insurance_sales_info isi SET isi.yc_c_second_gener = NULL, isi.establish_time1 = NULL WHERE isi.yc_c_second_gener = #{insuranceSalerId}
UPDATE insurance_sales_info isi SET isi.yc_b_first_gener = NULL, isi.establish_time2 = NULL WHERE isi.yc_b_first_gener = #{insuranceSalerId}
UPDATE insurance_sales_info isi SET isi.yc_b_second_gener = NULL, isi.establish_time3 = NULL WHERE isi.yc_b_second_gener = #{insuranceSalerId}

UPDATE insurance_sales_info
sales_org_id = #{salesOrgId}, sales_team_id = #{salesTeamId}, rank_sequence_id = #{rankSequenceId}, sales_grade_id = #{salesGradeId}, db_sales_id = #{dbSalesId}, tj_sales_id = #{tjSalesId}, sj_sales_id = #{sjSalesId}, jc_sales_id = #{jcSalesId}, fd_sales_id = #{fdSalesId},
db_sales_date = #{dbSalesDate}, db_sales_date = null,
tj_sales_date = #{tjSalesDate}, tj_sales_date = null,
sj_sales_date = #{sjSalesDate}, sj_sales_date = null,
jc_sales_date = #{jcSalesDate}, jc_sales_date = null,
fd_sales_date = #{fdSalesDate}, fd_sales_date = null,
yc_c_first_gener = #{ycCFirstGener}, yc_c_second_gener = #{ycCSecondGener}, yc_b_first_gener = #{ycBFirstGener}, yc_b_second_gener = #{ycBSecondGener}, direct_group_c = #{directGroupC}, direct_dept_b = #{directDeptB},
establish_time = #{establishTime}, establish_time = null,
establish_time1 = #{establishTime1}, establish_time1 = null,
establish_time2 = #{establishTime2}, establish_time2 = null,
establish_time3 = #{establishTime3}, establish_time3 = null,
establish_time4 = #{establishTime4}, establish_time4 = null,
establish_time5 = #{establishTime5}, establish_time5 = null,
updated_time = #{updatedTime}
WHERE `insurance_sales_id` = #{insuranceSalesId}
mapper.select: SELECT shi.employee_no FROM salers_hk_info shi WHERE shi.mobile = #{mobile}

SELECT isi.SALES_ORG_ID, isi.CARD_NO, isi.INSURANCE_SALER, isi.INSURANCE_SALER_NO, isi.SALES_STATUS, isi.MOBILE FROM insurance_sales_info isi, (SELECT log.saler_no FROM sales_noticy_hk_logs log WHERE is_finshed = '0' AND `type` = '0' GROUP BY saler_no) a WHERE a.saler_no = isi.INSURANCE_SALER_NO limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}

SELECT isi.INSURANCE_SALES_ID as saler_id,isi.INSURANCE_SALER_NO,isi.SALES_GRADE_ID,isi.SALES_ORG_ID,isi.SALES_TEAM_ID, CASE WHEN sml.PRE_SALES_GRADE_ID is not null then sml.PRE_SALES_GRADE_ID ELSE isi.SALES_GRADE_ID END AS PRE_SALES_GRADE_ID, CASE when sml.PRE_TEAM_ID is not null then sml.PRE_TEAM_ID ELSE isi.SALES_TEAM_ID END AS PRE_TEAM_ID, CASE when sml.PRE_ORG_ID is not null then sml.PRE_ORG_ID ELSE isi.SALES_ORG_ID END AS PRE_ORG_ID, cprc.exclude_directly_group_flag,cprc1.include_directly_group_flag,IFNULL(cprc.active_saler_flag,'0') AS active_saler_flag, case WHEN soi.is_default_cal = '0' THEN soi.cal_org_id ELSE soi.SALES_ORG_ID END AS cal_use_org_id FROM insurance_sales_info isi LEFT JOIN sales_org_info soi ON isi.SALES_ORG_ID = soi.SALES_ORG_ID LEFT JOIN cal_param_rule_config cprc ON soi.cal_org_id = cprc.org_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * from sales_move_logs sm where sm.MOVE_DATE = #{lastMonth}) sml ON isi.INSURANCE_SALES_ID = sml.SALER_ID LEFT JOIN cal_param_rule_config cprc1 ON soi.cal_org_id = cprc1.org_id where cprc.param_type = '4' and cprc1.param_type = '5'

SELECT isi.*,soi.SALES_ORG_NAME,get_cal_basic_org(isi.SALES_ORG_ID) basic_org,sti.SALES_TEAM_NAME,sg.SALES_GRADE_NAME from insurance_sales_info isi LEFT JOIN sales_org_info soi ON isi.SALES_ORG_ID = soi.SALES_ORG_ID LEFT JOIN sales_team_info sti ON isi.SALES_TEAM_ID = sti.SALES_TEAM_ID LEFT JOIN sales_grade sg ON isi.SALES_GRADE_ID = sg.SALES_GRADE_ID WHERE 1=1 and isi.INSURANCE_SALES_ID = #{insuranceSalesId}

update.foreach:
UPDATE insurance_sales_info
SALES_STATUS = #{item.salesStatus},
QUIT_DATE = #{item.quitDate},
updated_time = now()
INSURANCE_SALER_NO = #{item.salesNo}
